ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] A very good weekend!
ygData.msgSnippet: Tee hee..:) The dirk I got was a real stroke of luck... well...kinda. II noticed that on Fennin Ro at least, the freeport guards in certain are constantly
ygData.messageBody:
Tee hee..:)

The dirk I got was a real stroke of luck...
well...kinda.

II noticed that on Fennin Ro at least, the freeport guards
in certain are constantly being killed by some one.

Well, I had saved up about 27pp before this just from being
a pack rat and being, I admit, twinked in the armor dept
by a good friend.

Anyway, the thing is these guys were killing the FP guards and
not looting the corpses for some reason. Kindly they let me loot them
so I did. Each guard would drop a fine steel longsword, a damaged
helm, and a kite shield. The FS weap would sell for 4.5pp and the
militia shield would sell for 8pp.

So I hung out with them for a while and made a small fortune ( 100pp).

Granted, I havent yet seen another group that would let me have the loot,
but if you can find one...its nice..:)

The dirk cost me 70pp too. I tried to find lower but every time I tried to
get a
lower price people would laugh at me.

So considering that I was lucky to have enought to get it at all...I decided
that
I would go ahead and plunk down 70pp. and boy is it worth it.
I love the dirk, and I love the way it looks...small, quick, deadly..*BG*

Anyway, tonight I think Ill start on those pesky Lambent quests..:)




> Probably the former. Although I'd check to make sure the paladin's got a
> decent weapon, since you've got a dirk and are a level up on him. <glares
> at Cerulia for owning a dirk>
>
> > How about some group tactics for bards lessons?
>
> Bah! By the time you get this you'll be level 11 and I'll go back to
being
> the list newbie! <glares enviously again>
>
> ;^)
>
> Peace
> Evulia, youngest bard on the list, again...
>
>
